com.soctec.soctec.network

Class NetworkHandler.ServerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.soctec.soctec.network.NetworkHandler.ServerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    NetworkHandler

    private class NetworkHandler.ServerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This thread can connect to the server and a) push data to it, or b) fetch data from it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerThread

        public ServerThread(java.lang.String ID,
                    boolean positiveRating)
        Initializes thread that pushes rating to server
        Parameters:
        ID - The ID of the user that was just given a new rating
        positiveRating - true, if the user was given a positive rating, o/w false

      • ServerThread

        public ServerThread(java.lang.String myID)
        Initializes thread that fetches rating from server
        Parameters:
        myID - The ID of this device's user
